name: Below The Stars
description:
A Short and Relaxing Telescope management game / prototype I made some time ago, The core idea isnt mind but the gameplay /desing is.
Made for https://frissongames.com/  and   https://abstractdw.com/

HOW TO PLAY 
Players must manage different observatories to complete research missions
In each observatory players need to build / manage Houses , Research facilities and Telescopes.  TIME IS LIMITED

Build Telescopes to gather Research points, build Research facilities to have better telescopes,  this instructor needs Human resources, you need to build houses.

Beware, Spaces are limited

The main goal is to gather Research points and complete missions

To gather research points goes to the mission window and select a mission. In the Avaible observatories menu, select a one or more observatory and click the checkmark to start the missions

Make sure to have at least one telescope of the required type in your observatory

If you meet all the mission requirements, you can start the mission

You will learn more while you play the game
